chapter.text: M
This revelation scripture est DI Almighty Omniscient
Forgiver pek acceptor repentance strict en enforcing retribution possessor all potenc! tie ne est ali di Him. Al Him est ultimate destiny
Neniom argues di revelations escept those disbelieve! Ne impon their apparent success

Disbelieving them est popol Noah many ali opponents them! Cxiu community persekut their messenger neutralize him. Ili argued falsehood defeat truth. Consequently mi pun them; kiel terrible est My retribution
Tiel judgment your Lord jam stamp upon those disbelieve ti ili est dwellers Infer

Those serv tron all those around gxi glor lauxd their Lord kred en Him! Ili pet forgiveness those kred Our Lord Your mercy Your knowledge encompass all ajx. Forgive those pent sekv Your path sxpar them retribution Infer
Our Lord admit them gxarden Eden Vi promes them kaj por righteous among their parents spouses infan. Vi est Almighty Sagx
Kaj protekt them fal en pek! Whomever Vi protekt fal en pek ti tag ating mercy Vi! This est greatest triumf
Those disbelieve told di abhorrence vi est eben mav than your own abhorrence yourselves. Vi invit kred vi chose disbelieve
Ili dir Our Lord vi put us death twice Vi don us 2 viv; nun ni konfes our pek! est tie any voj out
This est when DI SOL advokat vi disbelieved when others menci Him vi kred. Do di judgment issued Li est plej Alt des Great
Li est 1 continuously montr vi His proofs send down vi cxiel provisions Nur those totally submit est able al pren heed
Do vi devote your worship absolutely DI SOL eben se disbelievers dislike gxi
Possessor de alt rang Ruler whole dominion. Li send inspiration bor His ordon al whomever Li chooses His servants avert Tag de Summoning
Ke est tag when everyone completely exposed neniom da them kasx anything el DI! Al whom aparten all sovereignty ke tag? Al DI 1 Supreme
Ke tag cxiu anim requited whatever gxi earned tie ne est injustice ke tag. DI est efficient EN reckoning
avert them imminent tag when kor terrified many vol est remorseful. transgressors ne hav amik nor intercessor obe
Li est fully aware da ki okul ne seg cxio mens conceal
DI JUGX equitably while idols ILI implore Him NE JUGX anything. DI EST UNU est Hearer Seer
Ili ne roam ter Did not consequences por those antaux them? Ili uz est fort than ili productive sur ter. Di pun them their pek nothing protekt them DI
Ke est their messengers ir them klar proofs ili disbelieved Consequently DI pun them. Li est Tre strict en enforcing retribution
Ni send Moses our sign profound auxtoritat
Al Pharaoh Haamaan Qaaroon. Ili dir magician; liar
Kaj when li montr them truth el us ili dir Kill fil de those kred him sxpar their daughters. Tiel scheming disbelievers est cxiam wicked
Pharaoh dir Let me kill Moses let him implore his Lord Mi worry lest li corrupts your religi stern evil throughout land
Moses dir mi streb rifugx my Lord your Lord el cxiu arrogant unu ne kred en Tag Reckoning

kred hom Pharaoh's popol concealing his belief est dir Kiel vi kill hom can just por dir ‘My Lord DI ' li montr vi est hav klar proofs el your Lord Li est liar est his problem kaj li est truthful vi benefit el his promes. Surely DI ne direkt any transgressor liar
O my popol hodiaux vi hav kingship upperhand! who help us kontraux di judgment should gxi ven us? Pharaoh dir Vi est sekv nur ki mi seg dec mi direkt vi nur dekstr path
Unu kred dir O my popol mi tim vi sam sort previous opponents
opponents Noah ‘Aad Thamoud others ven them. DI NE wish any injustice POPOL
O my popol mi tim por vi Tag de Summoning
Est tag when vi wish turn around flee! nothing protekt vi tiam DI. Whomever DI send astray nothing direkt him

Joseph ven vi antaux ke klar revelations vi ad dub his message Tiam when li mort vi dir "DI testament ne send any ali messenger him! (Li est last messenger!) DI tiel send astray those est transgressors doubtful
Ili argue di revelations any basis. This est trajt plej abhorred DI per those kred. DI TIEL SIGEL KOR CXIU arrogant TIRAN
Pharaoh dir O Haamaan cxarpent me alt tur mi reach out discover
(Mi want reach heaven pren jen di Moses Mi kred li est liar. Do est evil works Pharaoh ornam en his okul tiel li kept sekv dekstr) path! Pharaoh's scheming est ver evil
Unu kred dir O my popol sekv me mi direkt vi en des tuj voj
O my popol this 1 life est temporary iluzi while Hereafter est etern abode
Whoever commits pek requited just ke whoever works righteousness! - Vir female - while kred these enter Paradise wherein ili ricev provisions any lim
O my popol while mi invit vi sav vi invit me hellfire
Vi invit me est unappreciative de DI set Him idols mi ne recognize. Mi invit vi Almighty Forgiver
Tie est ne dub ke ki vi invit me do ne hav basis en this mond nor Hereafter ke our ultimate return est DI ke transgressors incurred hellfire
Kelk tag vi memor ki mi telling vi tuj Mi las judgment this materi DI; DI est Seer all popol
DI TIAM protekt him EL their evil schemes while POPOL Pharaoh incurred MAV retribution
Infer montr them tag kaj nokt, Tag Resurrection Admit Pharaoh's popol into mav retribution
As ili argue Infer followers dir al their estr Ni do gxi uz your followers est vi sxpar us any part this Infer
Estr dir Ni est all en this together DI JUGX among des popol
Those en hellfire dir al guardians Infer Vok your Lord redukt retribution us eben unu tag
Ili dir Did vi ne ricev your messengers liver vi klar messages Ili respond Jes ni did Ili dir Tiam implore vi wish imploring de disbelievers est cxiam en vain
plej assuredly ni don victory our messengers those kred ambaux en this mond tag witnesses summoned
Ke tag apologies disbelievers ne benefit them. Ili incurred condemnation; ili incurred mav destiny
Ni don Moses guidance far Infan Israel hered scripture
(Their histori) est lecion reminder those posed intelligence
Do est pacient di promes est ver pet forgiveness your pek glor lauxd your Lord nokt tag
Surely those who argue di revelations proof est exposing arrogance kasx their kest ili est ne eben aware da gxi! Do streb rifugx DI; Li est Hearer Seer
creation de heavens ter est ecx awesome than creation human est plej popol ne kon
Ne egal est blind seer. Nor est those kred work righteousness egal al sinners! Rarely do vi pren heed
plej certainly Hor (Tag Judgment ven ne dub gxi plej popol ne kred)
Your Lord dir Implore Me mi respond vi! Surely those est tro arrogant worship Me enter Gehenna forcibly
DI EST UNU DESEGN NOKT TIAL VI RIPOZ gxi, TAG lighted. DI bestows many blessings POPOL PLEJ POPOL NE est thankful
Such est DI your Lord Creator all ajx. tie ne est di escept Li! Kiel vi deviate
Deviating est those disregard di revelations
DI EST UNU rendered TER habitable POR VI CXIEL formidable STRUKTUR LI DESEGN VI DESEGN VI NU. Li est Unu proviz vi bon provisions Such est DI your Lord Exalted est DI Lord univers
Li est Viv tie ne est di escept Li! Vi worship Him sol devoting your religi absolutely Him sol! Lauxd est DI Lord univers
dir mi enjoined worshipping idols vi worship DI when klar revelations ven me my Lord Mi komand submit Lord univers

Li est Unu kre vi polv subsequently tiny gut tiam el pend embryo tiam Li brings vi out infan tiam Li lets vi reach maturity tiam vi igx old - kelk da vi mort fru. Vi ating predetermined agx vi kompren
Li est nur Unu controls life death. Al hav anything done Li simply dir al Est gxi est
Vi not those argue di proofs kaj kiel ili hav deviated
Ili est des unu disbelieved scripture messages ni send our messengers. Do ili do gxi surely trov out
shackles est their kol cxen est uz al tren them
En Inferno tiam en Fajr ili brul
Ili pet Kie est idols vi uz worship
beside DI? Ili dir Ili abandoned us. En fakt, when ni worshipped them ni worshipping nothing. Do does DI send disbelievers astray
This vi uz gxoj false doctrines ter vi uz promote them
Enter gates Gehenna wherein vi abide forever Ki miserable destiny por arrogant unu
Vi est pacient di promes est truth. Ni montr vi kelk da (retribution) ni promes them terminate your life antaux ke, ili returned us
Ni send messengers vi - kelk da them ni menci vi kelk ni ne menci vi. Ne messenger produkt any mirakl di authorization Once di judgment issued truth dominates falsifiers exposed humiliated
DI EST UNU KRE livestock VI; KELK VI RAJD KELK VI MANGX
Ili ankaux proviz vi additional benefits sat many da your bezon. Sur them ankaux as sur sxip vi port
Li tiel montr vi His proofs Which de di proofs vi deny
Ili ne roamed ter not consequences those preceded them? Ili uz est greater numer greater en potenc posed greater legacy ter. all their achievements ne help them en des malplej
When their messengers ir them klar proofs ili gxoj knowledge ili hered tre ajx ili ridiculed est ig their auxtun
Subsequently when ili seg our retribution ili dir Nun ni kred en DI SOL ni tuj disbelieve idol worship ti ni uz practice
Their belief tiam ne help them en des malplej once ili seg our retribution. Such est di sistem establ deal kun His creatures; disbelievers cxiam doomed
